Introduction

Bao is a South Korean rapper and Twitch streamer under Nature Space entertainment. He is a former member of the boy groups LUCENTE and XD (formerly XEED).

Bao debuted as a member of LUCENTE on September 18, 2018 with the release of their debut mini album "The Big Dipper". In April of 2021 Bao announced that he had left LUCENTE as his contract with NOGA had come to an end. He later stated his plans to release music on his own. In March of 2022, Bao was introduced as a member of the pre-debut group XEED. They debuted on December 1, 2022 with the mini album Dreamland. He later went on to make his solo debut with the single "Why So Serious?" on September 12, 2024.
